mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.PAR_PERSONAL_ID as parPersonalId, a.COUNTRY as country, a.ADDRESS as address, a.CITY as city, a.ROVINCE as rovince, a.ZIP_CODE as zipCode, a.ADDRESS_TYPE as addressType, a.OTHER_COUNTRY as otherCountry, a.OTHER_BIRTH_COUNTRY as otherBirthCountry, a.CREATED_BY as createdBy, a.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, a.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, a.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_ADDRESS( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , PAR_PERSONAL_ID , COUNTRY , ADDRESS , CITY , ROVINCE , ZIP_CODE , ADDRESS_TYPE , OTHER_COUNTRY , OTHER_BIRTH_COUNTRY , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{parPersonalId} , #{country} , #{address} , #{city} , #{rovince} , #{zipCode} , #{addressType} , #{otherCountry} , #{otherBirthCountry} , #{createdBy} , #{createdDate} , #{updatedBy} , #{updatedDate} )

INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_ADDRESS
ID ,
ACCOUNT_ID ,
PAR_PERSONAL_ID ,
COUNTRY ,
ADDRESS ,
CITY ,
ROVINCE ,
ZIP_CODE ,
ADDRESS_TYPE ,

CREATED_BY ,

UPDATED_BY ,
UPDATED_DATE

#{accountId} ,

#{country} ,

mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_ADDRESS
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
PAR_PERSONAL_ID = #{parPersonalId} ,
COUNTRY = #{country} ,
ADDRESS = #{address} ,
CITY = #{city} ,
ROVINCE = #{rovince} ,
ZIP_CODE = #{zipCode} ,
ADDRESS_TYPE = #{addressType} ,
OTHER_COUNTRY = #{otherCountry} ,
OTHER_BIRTH_COUNTRY = #{otherBirthCountry} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} ,
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} ,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} ,
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_ADDRESS( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , PAR_PERSONAL_ID , COUNTRY , ADDRESS , CITY , ROVINCE , ZIP_CODE , ADDRESS_TYPE , OTHER_COUNTRY , OTHER_BIRTH_COUNTRY , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.parPersonalId} , #{item.country} , #{item.address} , #{item.city} , #{item.rovince} , #{item.zipCode} , #{item.addressType} , #{item.otherCountry} , #{item.otherBirthCountry} , #{item.createdBy} , #{item.createdDate} , #{item.updatedBy} , #{item.updatedDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_ADDRESS SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , PAR_PERSONAL_ID = #{item.parPersonalId} , COUNTRY = #{item.country} , ADDRESS = #{item.address} , CITY = #{item.city} , ROVINCE = #{item.rovince} , ZIP_CODE = #{item.zipCode} , ADDRESS_TYPE = #{item.addressType} , OTHER_COUNTRY = #{item.otherCountry} , OTHER_BIRTH_COUNTRY = #{item.otherBirthCountry} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{item.createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{item.updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{item.updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_ADDRESS SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , PAR_PERSONAL_ID = #{parPersonalId} , COUNTRY = #{country} , ADDRESS = #{address} , CITY = #{city} , ROVINCE = #{rovince} , ZIP_CODE = #{zipCode} , ADDRESS_TYPE = #{addressType} , OTHER_COUNTRY = #{otherCountry} , OTHER_BIRTH_COUNTRY = #{otherBirthCountry} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_PAR_ADDRESS a WHERE a.ID = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ACCOUNT_PAR_ADDRESS a WHERE a.PAR_PERSONAL_ID = #{parPersonalId}
